llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article introduces the concept of CTE Centers as a new driver of workforce development, which is not yet represented in the graph.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: CTE Centers

topic_category.motivation: CTE Centers represent a new driver of workforce development, influencing labor market dynamics and educational policy, thus qualifying as a macro-level driver.

relevance_gate.reason: CTE Centers are a specific education and workforce development initiative, an industry vertical rather than a macro driver or tradable asset.
